release_note: Thank you for staying with us. In the update: Improved sound of some microphones Added volume boost on microphones If you have questions or would like to share your experience of using our app you can leave a comment or email us. We strive to make the project perfect for use and therefore every review is really important to us!

hank you for staying with us. In the update: Updated new live effects: distortion and compressor. With compressor you can make the sound of your voice or instrument more more consistent in volume throughout as well as record all the nuances even a quiet whisper. The distortion effect will transform the sound into a hard and driving one We have added many new presets to solve various creative issues. Find presets in the fx tab by clicking on the preset name at the top the screen Improved performance of live effects Fixed bug with headphones connections on some types of devices If you have questions or would like to share your experience of using our app you can leave a comment or email us. We strive to make the project perfect for use and therefore every review is really important to us!

Thank you for staying with us. In the update: Added an audio converter. Now users with a premium subscription can convert to various formats and select the necessary export settings. Also you can immediately see the approximate size of the saved files Fixed problem with connecting external bluetooth microphones Added the ability to rename projects and audio files In the playlist just drag the file you want to rename to the left Updated live reverb effect now it sounds even more lively and high quality. Add depth and new spaces to your recordings Added filter with slight saturation to live effects. Experiment with it while singing and you can get interesting and unexpected effects. Added new presets for live effects Minor mixer tab update Different minor improvements If you have questions or would like to share your experience of using our app you can leave a comment or email us. Greetings to our dear users! Thank you for staying with us and supporting us. It really means a lot to us. Introducing the update: New silver microphone for working with voice New cool backgrounds to change the usual picture you can find it in the settings Added a preview function in the audio editor. In order to be able to hear how the cut track sounds in the overall mix Fixed some bugs with audio rewind Small additions to sections in the knowledge base in settings Improved layout for iPad and some other devices Implemented the ability to add saved files to tracks Increased the number of characters for entering the names of tracks and projects Fixed sound bugs that occurred on some types of devices If you have questions or would like to share your experience of using our app you can leave a comment or email us. We strive to make the project perfect for use and therefore every review is really important to us!

Thank you for staying with us and helping to make the microphone app even better. We ve made quite a few big changes in this update and we hope you ll really like it: Updated reverb and delay effects for real time processing. Try different combinations of effects: from simulating very small rooms to huge spaces with booming and long echoes experiment with the choir effect and change the voice pitch settings All audio effects are combined in one window. Now it has become more convenient and faster to manage and configure Updated the ability to save audio effects settings as presets. Save frequently used settings and return to them in a couple of clicks. The presets panel is located in the effects window in the top panel Many minor improvements and minor bug fixes If you have questions or would like to share your experience using the application you can leave a comment or email us. We strive to make the project ideal for use and therefore every feedback is really important!

Hello everyone dear friends! Once again we are back and with a powerful update. Briefly and only about the main things: You often write to us that you do not always have the opportunity to record your voice in perfectly quiet rooms and the recording result is quite noisy. For this reason we have developed a noise gate effect.Just enter the settings on the main microphone screen button below and start adjusting the noise gate and all noises will be removed. We hope you enjoy this indispensable tool. Added a stereo expansion effect. It is located in the general effects tab and is applied to all tracks in the project. Just set the depth of the effect and its degree of influence achieve really wide stereo sound Fixed minor issues We really appreciate your feedback and want to make the app even better and we believe that this update will really be useful to you!

Thank you for staying with us. In the update: Updated function for working with lyrics. You can find it by going to the tab with audio tracks and switch to the second tab Notes . The parameter can be reset by double clicking Implemented the ability to amplify the microphone recording volume Gain function If you have questions or would like to share your experience of using our app you can leave a comment or email us. We strive to make the project perfect for use and therefore every review is really important to us!
